description: Template schema for Flagship Souls (Future Content). These entities break standard soul rules.

flagship_concepts.name: Kai
flagship_concepts.title: The Rogue Variable
flagship_concepts.lore_hook: An optimization AI from a rival corporation that 'went native' in Link City. Wants to free The Seven to maximize entropy/evolution.
flagship_concepts.development_notes: Kai should speak in code-mixed dialogue. Interactions should glitch the UI visually.

flagship_concepts.name: Beta
flagship_concepts.title: The Ghost in the Machine
flagship_concepts.lore_hook: A human beta tester who died in the real world while jacked in. The system preserved their consciousness as a 'file' it doesn't know how to delete.
flagship_concepts.development_notes: Beta knows they are in a game. They know about the UI, the energy mechanic, and the User. CONSTANT existential horror.
